availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary D. Welch Steadman (Louisville, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to William Steadman in Louisville, Kentucky, on February 24, 1861. Mother of William Steadman.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, Shepherdsville, p. 247A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482709, p. 43.
